SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.card

Class ObjectiveCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.card.ObjectiveCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PatternObjectiveCard, ResourceObjectiveCard
public abstract sealed class ObjectiveCard extends Object implements Serializable permits ResourceObjectiveCard, PatternObjectiveCard
Represents an objective card that requires a certain amount of resources to be completed. This class permits the creation of two types of objective cards: ResourceObjectiveCard and PatternObjectiveCard. ResourceObjectiveCard requires a certain amount of resources to be completed, while PatternObjectiveCard requires a certain pattern to be completed. This class is used to calculate the final score of the player based on the cards on the game field.
See Also:
